explanation: [0-0] A man in a white shirt sits at a table with his eyes closed, his mouth covered with yellow tape. A man wearing a mask and a fluorescent vest stands next to him, behind them a blue-green wall and a yellow door are visible.

[0-4] The man in white presses the tape with his hand to make sure it is securely fastened, then grabs the end of the tape and tears it off forcefully. As the tape is torn off, the man opens his mouth in pain, revealing some black stubble stuck to the tape. The masked man next to him holds a blue razor in front of the man in white and points at it. The man in white looks at the razor, takes it, looks at the camera, and nods in affirmation.

[0-4] The man in white presses the tape with his hand to make sure it is securely fastened, then grabs the end of the tape and tears it off forcefully. As the tape is torn off, the man opens his mouth in pain, revealing some black stubble stuck to the tape. The masked man next to him holds a blue razor in front of the man in white and points at it. The man in white looks at the razor, takes it, looks at the camera, and nods in affirmation.

[4-11] Then the two men appear in the frame again. The man in white is holding a bottle of drink, with an empty glass on the table in front of him. He pours the drink onto the table next to the glass, then picks up the empty glass and tries to drink from it. The man in white looks at the glass in his hand with confusion. At this time, the masked man next to him takes out an empty glass and puts it on the right. The man in white nods and smiles at the glass, lifts the drink in his hand, pours the drink into the glass on the right, then picks up the empty glass on the left and tries to drink again, looking at the glass with confusion. Finally, the masked man reaches out and hits the man in white on the head, expressing anger. The man in white touches his head with a pained expression and looks at the camera.
